title: (x) Hannah Katherine italic display type - custom drawn (poorly) {Lex}
content:
All:

I’m pretty well stuck in book types and when a friend asked me what this is, I didn’t have any idea but assured him one of you would identify it in a trice. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

author: Bruce

comments.content:
This is almost surely custom drawn (and quite poorly, may I add - many of the curves are very lumpy).

- Lex
